title: Jinx's bug in game
body: there is a glitch in game. after some patches u guys did, jinx's q status doesn't show any more. for detail, i've attached a picture.

replies.body: whats the problem here I don't see it, that icon is showing what jinx is using right now she is using her mini gun.

The icon appears when you 1st level q and disappears as soon as you swap stances for the 1st time. I assumed that it was intended by riot and that the glitch was it showing at all. In the patch notes they said something along the lines of "removing buffs already well represented visually in the game space" to cut down on UI clutter.

It was nice to have perhaps but I've not found it too difficult to keep track of which stance I'm in without it, and I'm awful at this game, lol.
Akali Ulti charges do not show anymore since last patch.
I've also noticed that her Q seems to be a little less responsive.
